original_title: Julie Mendez - from PTSD to Art
overview: Julie Mendez served in the Iraq War. Finding herself on convoys engaging insurgents, she came to question the reason why so many Iraqi found the Americans as invaders rather than liberators. She turned to art to recover from her experiences.
tagline: Sometimes pain cannot be expressed or exorcised through words.
title: Julie Mendez - from PTSD to Art
